attributes.action: Explain why the Ratification of the Lisbon Treaty will be forced on the British Public, even though we were promised a Referendum on this subject
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am informed that the only reason that this goverment is in power after all that has occured in the last few months, is that Mr Blair intervened with Mr Mandelson, and told him to put a stop to the rebels to avoid a general election which would have spoilt Tony Blairs chances of being the president of the EU, and we thought the Kinnocks were bad.

rejection.details: As the details in your petition cannot be verified, we cannot accept this petition.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
